Toxic ass community, shit developers that don't care about what the community wants. I might play the shit out of it, but it isn't for everyone. Skip the end game chats and you might enjoy it.

TLDR; Play only if you want to get frustrated! Almost everyone is trying to get you mad somehow.

Here is what happens to me most of the times as survivor:
I have to play together with absolute bloody noobs, but i have 2,5 k and they literally play like braindead. MMR matchmaking is broken.

Either they don't do gens, or they don't rescue someone on the hook, just ignoring them.

Or they run into the basement where basement bubba is camping with 3 persons at the same time, just to get downed. Or they lure the killer to where I am doing a gen.
Or they give away your position to the killer, because they do rushed actions on purpose.
Or, or, or. The examples are countless.
You often get camped by killers. Or they are mad when the game didn't went well for them and then when they manage to down you as the gates are open, they let you bleed out, which is stealing your time on purpose. They do it just to get you mad.

As a killer this is what happens to me:
I often get SWF survivor group that behave toxic, sabotaging hooks, body blocking, running up the library on Racoon city PD and tricking you with their friends, if you don't follow them, they won't do gens.
If they manage to do all gens and get to the exit, they wait at the exit for you just to troll or teabag you. 

In short: Matchmaking is broken and people are toxic. Fun is seldom.

So why do I have 2,5 k if this game isn't fun, you ask: 

The game mechanics itself are good, but the devs do nothing to repair the flaws of it, like tunneling or camping.

I used to HAD fun, when I played together with friends or some random people from a discord server. 

But if you play as survivor with randoms you are doomed.

As I killer I am not very good (only with 1 or 2 killers, as I play surv main), and then people troll at the end gets me frustrated, why do they have to do this? Can't they just go out without teabagging, or just running in front of the gate, just to show you: Hey we did it noob? Or saying "GG" in the chat afterwards when it clearly wasn't a gg? I think this is just toxic.

So the game is a solid 7 out of 10

Sour Cherry and Pistachio Danish recipe 


Ingredients

1 3⁄4 cups (225 g) dried sour cherries
1 1⁄2 cups (350 ml) orange liqueur such as Cointreau or Grand Marnier
5 star anise
2 cinnamon sticks
1 dried chile de árbol, stemmed
Juice and finely grated zest of 1½ oranges (about ⅓ cup juice)
Kosher salt
2 large egg yolks
1 tbsp. plus 1 tsp. heavy cream
1 batch Tartine’s Croissants dough (pg. 28), prepared through Step 7
Bread flour, for dusting
1⁄4 cup lightly toasted pistachios, cooled and crushed to a coarse powder in a food processor

Instructions

Make the cherry compote: In a small pot, combine the cherries, orange liqueur, star anise, cinnamon, chile, orange juice and zest, and a pinch of salt. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then immediately remove. Set aside to cool completely.
Drain the cherries, reserving soaking liquid. Discard the star anise and cinnamon, and transfer the cherries and chile to a food processor. Pulse to make a coarse paste, then transfer to a small bowl and set aside.
In a separate small bowl, beat the egg yolks and heavy cream; set aside. Three hours before you are ready to serve, remove the thawed dough from the refrigerator. Place the dough on a lightly floured work surface and use a rolling pin to flatten it to a 13×34-inch rectangle about 1⁄8 inch thick. Use a straight edge and a paring knife or pizza cutter to trim about ½ inch from all 4 sides so that you have an even, 12×33-inch piece of dough. With one of the long sides facing you, lightly brush a 1-inch strip along the long side farthest from you with the egg wash. Then use an offset spatula or the back of a spoon to spread the compote evenly over the rest of the dough. Roll the dough up away from you like a jelly roll to make a log about 4 inches in diameter. Press gently on the seam to seal. Cut the log in half, wrap in plastic, and transfer to the freezer to chill before slicing, 15–20 minutes. (Or, you can freeze one or both logs for up to a week. Thaw in the refrigerator before using.)
Line 4 baking sheets with parchment paper and set aside. Place 2 racks at least 3 inches apart in the center of the oven, then preheat to 400°. Set a large, wide baking dish filled with water on the floor of the oven. Remove the rolls of dough from the freezer and slice into twenty-eight to thirty 1¼-inch-thick disks. Space the disks evenly apart on the prepared baking sheets, then place in a warm, preferably humid spot. Let rise until they are puffed, very gassy, and the layers of dough are beginning to separate, 35–45 minutes.
Once risen, brush the pastries evenly with the egg wash. Bake until evenly golden brown, 24–28 minutes. Remove and brush each with some of the reserved cherry soaking liquid, then sprinkle with crushed pistachios. Serve immediately.

Fuggin Rocks for a classic horror chase em down and run concept

huhu :) ich habe lange überlegt und mich entschieden ich schreibe mal was zu diesen spiel :) also ich spiele das spiel jetzt seid 1074 Stunden und muss sagen hätte ich das gewusst das es so enden wird  oder so schlimm sein wird hätte ich mir das game nie geholt. wieso nie geholt ? ganz einfach  wenn du ins spiel startest macht es noch spaß aber mit der Zeit merkst du wie die Entwickler mit dem spiel umgehen die Überlebenden haben gefühlt 90 prozent die besten sachen  also ( sachen und perks) und die Killer bekommen meist den Krassen und sinnlosen nerf ( ich sag nur ruin oder das Gespenst) was passiert also? die Killer fangen an zu Tunneln und zu campen. das haben sie auch schon früher gemacht versteht mich nicht falsch aber jetzt wirds es immer schlimmer und selbst ich als überlebender sage das es totaler blödsinn ist was die entwickler aus dem spiel machen  bugs oder fehler werden kaum bis garnicht behoben und wenn erst nach jahren ( ich sag nur blink bug der nurse und der trapper bug wo sie über die fallen springen können ist immer noch seit jahren drinne) aber was ich das traurigste finde ist das das Geld den Entwiklern wohl wichtiger ist wieso ich drauf komme? ganz einfach es werden jede 3 Monate dlc herausgebracht mit neuen Killern die am ende keiner mehr spielt oder kaum ich sag nur das Mädel aus dem Brunnen oder deathslinger ^^  und ne ganze menge skins aber wie schon oben gesagt um bugs oder fehler wird sich kaum gekümmert (geschweige den um die cheater die sehr lange den spaß verdorben haben ) außer es sind fehler die Überlebende haben dann wird es meist sofort gerichtet. im großen und ganzen müsst ihr wissen ob ihr euch das Game holt aber ich würde es mir nicht noch einmal  holen  das Konzept ist cool :) keine frage und so an sich macht es spaß aber man wird sehr schnell gefrustet (besonders als killer ) wie auch immer am ende entscheidet ihr alleine was ihr kauft :)  ich bleiben bei guten story games und 7 days to die ist viel sinnvoller  bis dann und gehabt euch wohl  :D
游戏很不错，玩法也很新颖，很可惜这游戏就是做不到平衡二字，我当屠夫跟当孙子似的，一改再改很难让人满意，设计师也是大聪明，两边都得罪，关于对新手极其不友好这我认，但是排一把根本就不能让人舒心，晕头转向，我也是个新手，满怀期待满怀热爱的新手，但是慢慢的我失去了对此游戏的热爱，何必来这里面受罪。
